name: BunnyCatch
description:
BunnyCatch is a simple, 2D, procedurally generated maze based puzzle game where you need to catch all rampant bunnies before the time runs out, by directing them towards their exits.

Click on the ground to place a barrier to instruct a bunny to go the direction you want, and click a barrier again to remove it.

OSX/iOS builds coming soon!

Please leave a comment describing your thoughts and experience of this game.

I appreciate all feedback, positive or negative.

Thank you.
